message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERINGTRAININGREQUIREMENT_XRV_TRAINING_ACTIVE_WITH_SERVICE_OFFERING
message.locale: The Training, %1s, already has an 'Active' relationship with the service offering, %2s.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERINGTRAININGREQUIREMENT_XRV_TRAINING_REMOVED_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: This Training Requirement, %1s , is 'Removed', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERINGTRAININGREQUIREMENT_XRV_TRAINING_ALREADY_REMOVED
message.locale: This Training Requirement, %1s , has already been 'Removed'.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERINGTRAININGREQUIREMENT_XRV_TRAINING_CANNOT_ADD_SERVICE_OFFERING_CANCELED
message.locale: This Service, %1s is '%2c',training requirement cannot be added.
